p: Crude methanolic extract of E. suberosa (Roxb) bark and its organic fractions were taken separately in test tubes (5 mL each). To each test tube, 5 mL of Benedictâ€™s reagent was added; the mixture was placed over hot water bath to boil for 5min. Resulting in reddish-brown precipitates indicated the presence of carbohydrates.[ 12]
